title: Weather Dashboard - Basic Fetch API
description: Learn the Fetch API by making HTTP requests to a weather service. Understand how to fetch data from servers and handle responses.

concepts.fetch: Browser API for making HTTP requests
concepts.http_methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE request types
concepts.promise_based: Fetch returns promises for async handling

learning_outcomes: Make HTTP GET requests with Fetch API
Handle fetch responses and parse JSON
